//IF TRUE, VIDEO WILL KEEP REPEATING// false //vid src - LOCATION OF VIDEO (flv or f4v)// //info - HTML FORMATTED TEXT THAT IS IN THE "INFO" PANEL// //still - LOCATION OF THE STILL IMAGE THAT DSPLAYS IF THE "stillImage" VARIABLE ABOVE IS SET TO "true"// //description - TEST THAT DISPLAYS UNDER THE VIDEO THUMB// //width - WIDTH OF THE VIDEO// //height - HEIGHT OF THE VIDEO// HTML FORMATTED TEXT
